briefdescription.para: The widget includes a combobox widget.
The widget includes a list view widget.
The widget includes a selection control.
The widget includes a file control.
The widget includes a flow layout with tags.
Get widget representation of the options action.

parameterdescription.para: Widget flags for the configuration of the widget (type)

briefdescription.para: Connect this action to a public action.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to public action to connect to
Whether to also connect descendant child actions

briefdescription.para: Disconnect this action from its public action.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to also disconnect descendant child actions

memberdef.argsstring: (QObject *parent, const QString &title, const QStringList &options=QStringList(), const QStringList &selectedOptions=QStringList())
memberdef.name: OptionsAction

briefdescription.para: Get whether a specific option exists.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the option to check for

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether a specific option exists

briefdescription.para: Get whether there are any options.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether there are any options

parameterdescription.para: Whether to clear the current selection

briefdescription.para: Get whether a specific option is selected.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the option to check for

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether the option is selected or not

briefdescription.para: Get whether one or more options are selected.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether one or more options are selected

parameterdescription.para: Whether to select or unselect the option

briefdescription.para: Load widget action from variant map.

parameterdescription.para: Variant map representation of the widget action

briefdescription.para: Save widget action to variant map.

simplesect.para: Variant map representation of the widget action

briefdescription.para: Set whether all options should be serialized to serializeAllOptions By default, only the selected options are serialized Setting this option to true will additionally serialize all options.

parameterdescription.para: Boolean determining whether all options should be serialized

briefdescription.para: Get whether all options should be serialized.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether all options should be serialized (by default, only the selected options are serialized)

briefdescription.para: Signals that the selected options changed.

detaileddescription.para: Action for selecting multiple options at once
